greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A318509(n) - A002487(n).
comment: All terms seem to be even. See the conjecture given in A261179.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to Stern's sequences
program: A318509(n) = { my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = A002487(f[i, 1])); factorback(f); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 02 2018
